resources.string: "Your device is showing Chinese characters instead of Kanji!\n\nClick the \"Apply Fix\" button below to prioritize Japanese Kanji instead. A device reboot will be required to see any changes."
"Your device is showing Kanji. You\'re all set!\n\nClick the \"Revert\" button below to restore your original fonts. A device reboot will be required."
"Your device is showing Kanji. You\'re all set!\n\nNo backup of your original file was found, so we can\'t revert. Sorry!"
